Verses: 1 karththaraith Thudhiyungal; Avar Nallavar, Avar Kirubai Endrumulladhu.
2 dhevaadhi Dhevanaith Thudhiyungal; Avar Kirubai Endrumulladhu.
3 karththaadhi Karththaraith Thudhiyungal; Avar Kirubai Endrumulladhu.
4 oruvaraaip Periya Adhisayangalaich Seygiravaraith Thudhiyungal; Avar Kirubai Endrumulladhu.
5 vaanangalai Gnaanamaai Undaakkinavaraith Thudhiyungal; Avar Kirubai Endrumulladhu.
6 thanneergalukku Mele Boomiyaip Parappinavaraith Thudhiyungal; Avar Kirubai Endrumulladhu.
7 periya Sudargalai Undaakkinavaraith Thudhiyungal; Avar Kirubai Endrumulladhu;
8 pagalil Aalach Sooriyanaip Padaiththavaraith Thudhiyungal; Avar Kirubai Endrumulladhu.
9 iravil Aalach Sandhiranaiyum Natchaththirangalaiyum Padaiththavaraith Thudhiyungal; Avar Kirubai Endrumulladhu;
10 egipthiyarudaiya Thalaichchangalaich Sangariththavaraith Thudhiyungal; Avar Kirubai Endrumulladhu.
11 avargal Naduvilirundhu Isravelaip Purappadappanninavaraith Thudhiyungal; Avar Kirubai Endrumulladhu.
12 balaththa Kaiyinaalum Ongiya Puyaththinaalum Adhaich Seydhavaraith Thudhiyungal; Avar Kirubai Endrumulladhu.
13 sivandha Samuththiraththai Irandaagap Piriththavaraith Thudhiyungal; Avar Kirubai Endrumulladhu.
14 adhin Naduve Isravelaik Kadandhupogappanninavaraith Thudhiyungal; Avar Kirubai Endrumulladhu.
15 paarvonaiyum Avan Senaigalaiyum Sivandha Samuththiraththil Kavizhththuppottavaraith Thudhiyungal; Avar Kirubai Endrumulladhu.
16 thammudaiya Janangalai Vanaandharaththil Nadaththinavaraith Thudhiyungal; Avar Kirubai Endrumulladhu.
17 periya Raajaakkalaich Sangariththavaraith Thudhiyungal; Avar Kirubai Endrumulladhu.
18 pirabalamaana Raajaakkalai Azhiththavaraith Thudhiyungal; Avar Kirubai Endrumulladhu.
19 emoriyarin Raajaavaagiya Seegonai Azhiththavaraith Thudhiyungal; Avar Kirubai Endrumulladhu.
20 paasaanin Raajaavaagiya Ogai Azhiththavaraith Thudhiyungal; Avar Kirubai Endrumulladhu.
21 avargal Dhesaththaich Sudhandharamaagath Thandhavaraith Thudhiyungal; Avar Kirubai Endrumulladhu.
22 adhaith Thammudaiya Dhaasanaagiya Isravelukkuch Sudhandharamaagave Thandhavaraith Thudhiyungal; Avar Kirubai Endrumulladhu.
23 nammudaiya Thaazhvil Nammai Ninaiththavaraith Thudhiyungal; Avar Kirubai Endrumulladhu.
24 nammudaiya Saththurukkalin Kaiyilirundhu Nammai Vidudhalaipanninavaraith Thudhiyungal; Avar Kirubai Endrumulladhu.
25 maamsadhegamulla Yaavukkum Aagaarang Kodukkiravaraith Thudhiyungal; Avar Kirubai Endrumulladhu.
26 paralogaththin Dhevanaith Thudhiyungal; Avar Kirubai Endrumulladhu.
